get.description: Returns a list of all menu items

example.description: Classic cheese pizza with tomato sauce and basil.

post.description: Adds a new menu item to the database

get.summary: Get a menu item by ID
get.description: Returns a single menu item by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the menu item to retrieve

put.description: Updates the details of an existing menu item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the menu item to update

delete.description: Deletes a menu item by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the menu item to delete

get.description: Returns a list of menu items for a given category

example.description: Classic cheese pizza with tomato sauce and basil.

post.summary: Upload an image for a menu item
post.description: Uploads an image file for a specific menu item and saves the image path to the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the menu item to upload the image for

message.example: An error occurred while uploading the image.

user_id.description: ID of the user placing the order

reservation_id.description: ID of the reservation for the order

value.error: The specified user is not associated with this reservation

put.summary: Add a menu item to an existing order

200.description: Menu item added to the order successfully

message.example: Menu item added to order successfully

404.description: Order or menu item not found

patch.summary: Update the status of an order item

status.description: The new status of the order item

Order not found.summary: Order does not exist in the system

Item not found.summary: The specified menu item does not exist

value.error: Item not found in the menu

Order item not found in this order.summary: The item does not exist in the specified order

value.error: Order item doesn’t exist in this order

patch.summary: Update the status of an order

status.description: The new status of the order

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to delete

200.description: List of orders for the user

404.description: User not found or no orders for the user

User not found.summary: This user is not registered in the system

No orders for this user.summary: No orders exist for the specified user

200.description: List of orders for this reservation

Order not found.summary: There is no order with this ID

Item not found in this order.summary: The specified item is not in this order

value.error: Item not found in this order

200.description: List of orders for the specified date

404.description: No orders found for the specified date

error.example: No orders found for this date

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the orders to fetch

200.description: List of orders with the specified status

error.example: Invalid status. Allowed values are Open, Served, Closed.

404.description: No orders found with the specified status

error.example: No orders found in this status

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the order items to fetch

200.description: List of order items with the specified status

error.example: Invalid status. Allowed values are Pending, In-progress, Completed, Served.

404.description: No items found with the specified status

error.example: No items found in this status

get.summary: Get order items by order ID

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to fetch items for

200.description: List of items for the specified order

404.description: Order not found or no items in the order

error.example: No such order with this id

Order not found.summary: No order found with the provided ID

value.error: No such order with this id

No items in this order.summary: The specified order has no items

delete.summary: Remove a menu item from an order

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order  which to remove the item from it

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: ID of the menu item to remove from the order

200.description: Menu item removed from the order successfully

message.example: Menu item removed from order successfully

Order not found.summary: There is no order with this ID

Menu item not found.summary: There is no menu item with this ID

Item not found in this order.summary: The specified item is not in this order

value.error: Item not found in this order

get.summary: Get reservations for a specific user
get.description: Retrieve all reservations for a user.

delete.description: Allows users to delete a reservation.

patch.description: Allows users to update an existing reservation.

get.description: Retrieve reservations based on the date.

get.description: Retrieve reservations based on the date and time.
Retrieve a specific reservation by its ID.
Retrieve all reservations for all users (staff only).

get.summary: Staff: Get all reservations for a specific user
get.description: Retrieve all reservations for a specific user (staff only).

get.description: Retrieve reservations by date and time (staff only).
